name: MyGF: Another Episode
description:
*This game contains content that some players may find disturbing, such as descriptions of gore and violence.

In addition, the opinions and behaviors expressed by the characters are not endorsed by the developer. Player discretion is advised. *

*Play the original game before purchasing this!* 

Free demo now available.

🤍A brand new game in the world of 'My GF Doesn't Know What I'm Into!' Discover new sides to the cast and enjoy the story from different perspectives.🤍  
  • Includes two Episodes*: 'Episode Amy' and 'Episode Mafuyu', featuring hours of content, new CGs, backgrounds, portraits, music, and some secrets to uncover!
  • Your choices matter: follow the different routes and possibilities that unlock based on your decisions.
  • Aim to see all endings to unlock the True End and new episodes.

🤍🤍🤍🤍🤍🤍

Help me release MyGF on Steam! We're aiming for $100 to pay for the required app credit.

Contact me: @meimcmei

Check out more games here.

🤍🤍🤍🤍🤍🤍

*Further episodes are planned and will be released in free updates for everyone who has purchased the game.

**If you can't pay on itch.io for any reason, send-me a Ko-fi of at least $4.00 with a note requesting an access key and I'll provide one.
